Subject: Content Allow only peoplestrong.com domain
Description: Hi Team, We need to update our DLP policies to restrict data uploads to all external domains, except for the domain peoplestrong.com. Please ensure that the peoplestrong.com domain is whitelisted so that users can upload data only to this domain, while all other domains are blocked. This update is required on priority. Allow: Uploads to the domain peoplestrong.com. Block: All other domains for data uploads. Regards, Harsh
